attributes.action: Stop cuts to the NHS, allow cancer patients to receive the treatment they need!
attributes.background: Health officials have just announced sweeping restrictions on treatment, which will mean more than 5,000 cancer patients will be denied life-extending drugs under plans which is a step backwards for the NHS, In total, 17 cancer drugs for 25 different indications will no longer be paid for in future.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107548

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
